name: Space Cowboys (jogacolhue)
description:
Two evil aliens are trying to invade the Earth at the same time, they'll decide who'll get to invade with a laser pistol duel.

Gameplay:

Wait until "SHOOT" appears in the screen to shoot your pistol, once the round is finished, click in "RESET" to go to the next round.

Controls: 

SPACE - shoot

Using assets from Asset Jam 7:

Pixel Space Assets : https://fungifurball.itch.io/space-assets

Pixel Planets: https://faktory.itch.io/pixel-planets
